column2: ??   At least two years of dedicated Android Development in Java   ??   Knowledgeable and comfortable working in concurrent or multi-  threaded code   ??   Understands best practices of iOS app design and supporting iPhone and iPad layouts via Storyboards   ??   Capable of designing new features by applying the appropriate Design Patterns,   and Object Oriented Programming concepts   ??   Experience with version control in a team environment,   a strong knowledge of GIT is preferred   ??   Knowledgeable about working with RESTful web services such as Facebook,   Twitter,   Parse or Urban Airship   ??   Experience in database environments such as MySQL,   SQL Server,   MongoDB,   is a plus   Wersquore looking for someone with this type of personality:      ??   Passion for mobile development and thirst to learn   ??   Enjoys working in a fast-  paced and dynamic environment   ??   A quick learner who can step up and take ownership of work to get things done   ??   Enjoys and appreciates working and collaborating with others from various background as part of a team   It would really be awesome if you have the following:      ??   Experience with wireless protocols   (especially Bluetooth Low Energy /   Bluetooth 4.0)     ??   Experience developing apps for external hardware   ??   Experience working in mixed Object-  C/  C code projects is a plus   ??   Portfolio of previous apps in the App Store   ??   Experience with or eager to learn Android development   ??   Experience or passion in working with lighting or other connected device   ??   Can communicate complex concepts in a clear and concise manner   ??   Enjoy any combination of Ping-  Pong,   Movies,   Music,   Sports,   Cake,   or brightly colored sunglasses   ??,60516500595.0,2019-07-24,2019-10-22,EducationalOccupationalCredential,24.0,Engineering - Software & QA,Back End Developer,BPO / Call Centre,app
